news.title: Netflix grants Warner Bros. Discovery 7-day waiver to reopen deal talks with Paramount Skydance
news.summary: Warner Bros. says it will engage in deal talks with Paramount Skydance under a 7-day waiver from Netflix. Warner Bros. Discovery on Tuesday said it would engage in deals with ParamountSkydance.

news.title: Iran partially closes Strait of Hormuz, a vital oil chokepoint, as U.S. talks get underway
news.summary: Iranian state media reported the partial closure of the Strait of Hormuz on Tuesday for military drills in the waterway. Iranian state media said military drills were taking place in the area.

news.title: Rev. Jesse Jackson, civil rights leader and former presidential candidate, dies at 84
news.summary: The Rev. Jesse Jackson was a civil rights icon and Baptist minister. He was a two-time Democratic presidential candidate. Jackson died in 2009. He is survived by his wife and three children.

news.title: Oil prices stable as Iran conducts war games in Strait of Hormuz
news.summary: The military exercises come as tensions are high between the U.S. and Iran. The military exercises are expected to last for up to a week.

news.title: Hyatt Chairman Pritzker leaves board over Epstein ties
news.summary: The 75-year-old billionaire heir said he would not seek reelection to the board at the annual stockholder meeting. He will not be re-elected to a second term.

news.title: How Paramount brought its failing bid for Warner Bros. back from the brink
news.summary: Paramount Skydance convinced Warner Bros. to reopen negotiations after signaling it was finally ready to raise its price. ParamountSkydance: We're ready to pay more than $100 million.

news.title: Buying stocks everyone loves is a recipe for underperformance — but Apple breaks the rule
news.summary: Unloved companies with rock-bottom expectations are the real engines of your portfolio. Unloved firms are often undervalued and underappreciated.

news.title: Gold prices tumble below $5,000, silver is under $75 as China holidays dent support
news.summary: Gold and silver are under pressure as U.S. investors return from Monday’s holiday. Gold and silver have been under pressure for the past few days.

news.title: General Mills cut its sales outlook to mark the fifth birthday of its ‘growth’ strategy
news.summary: General Mills’s stock was set to fall after the full-year profit and sales outlook were lowered. The consumer recovery has been slower and has cost more than expected.

news.title: Stop watching gold’s daily swings and get ready for a $10,000 supercycle
news.summary: Investors seeking a portfolio hedge will have two choices: gold or the U.S. dollar. Gold is the most popular currency in the world.
